channel.title: Express Lane on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Express Lane on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-70 East - Express Toll Lanes
item.description: I-70 East approaching entrance Express Toll Lanes. This lane is the left most lane and runs to US-6 junction above Golden.

item.title: 400 South at I-15 (Exit 307)
item.description: 400 South at I-15 (Exit 307) in downtown Salt Lake City. Use I-15 North for Ogden. Express lane/HOV entrance for I-15 South.
